Title: Jeff Bezos once said the quiet part out loud — envisioning that you'll give up your PC for an AI cloud version from the likes of Amazon and Microsoft.Will the DRAM price rout make it true?

Title: The UK outlaws deepfake nudes on X after Grok AI uproar — Sorry, Elon, it’s nothing to do with suppression of free speech
Description: The UK is bringing into force a law that will make it illegal to create non-consensual intimate deepfake images after X's Grok AI was spotted generating sexually explicit images of real people without consent.
